title: Ed Niedermeyer (Author of "Ludicrous: The Unvarnished Story of Tesla Motors")
description:
Ed Niedermeyer is the author of 'Ludicrous: the Unvarnished Story of Tesla Motors," a new book which discusses the EV carmaker's history, business and manufacturing practices, its contributions to the automotive community, and its founder, Elon Musk. Ed was the editor of The Truth About Cars, where he provided similar analysis about other brands.

 

Buy his book! https://www.amazon.com/Ludicrous-Unvarnished-Story-Tesla-Motors/dp/1948836122

WATCH the show: https://youtu.be/fc8kwLIeKTs

 

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman @tweetermeyer

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
